prema sabandathawak pawathwagena giya kanthawaka swamipurushaya mara damima gana chodana labu shri lankikayakuta dubayi adhikaranaya maraniya danduwama niyama kara thibe.rowan kumar namathi 23 hawiridi tharunayakuta melesa marana danduwama niyama kara athi shreshtadhikaranaya ohuta prasiddhiye wedi thaba ghathanaya karana lesa niyama kara thibe.me ghathanaya sidukala bawata sakakaru adhikaranaya idiriye warada piligena thibena bawa da, widesha katayuthu amathyansha konsiyular departhamenthuwe jyeshta prakashakayek “dinamina” ta pawasiya.ghathanayata lakwu pudgalaya da shri lankikayaku wana athara ohu ghathakayage samipathama mithuraku bawa da wartha weyi.
